sources.title: DOUBLE FEATURE HELL 8 (Grindhouse 3)
sources.description: ADULT CONTENT -- NUDITY The 2am Theater staff was out on parole just long enough to cobble together this third and final grindhouse double feature simulation: Your cinematic dumpster diving begins with previews of coming infractions, followed by the short, "These Girls Are fools." The first feature presentation, in blushing color, is the topless sci fi anti-classic, "Nude on the Moon." Next an intermission short, "All Men Are Apes," is followed by the second feature presentation, "Scum of the Earth," which teaches us how to run a girly photos racket. Take notes. (Special thanks to content-contributing member Freddie Jaye for making "Nude on the Moon" available.)
